announcement:
Hey there Egg Gamers!

BWD has fixed the in-game fog with the latest update so now the MegaMod's Custom Fog Mod finally works!

Be sure to check it out - enjoy!

content: [MegaMod] Fixed bugs caused by most recent Shell Shockers update (1.0.14)
[MegaMod] The latest proxy (eggtown.org) is now supported
[Custom Crosshair] Introducing the Custom Crosshair Mod! Customize various aspects of the in-game crosshairs and scope!
